docs.lead_paragraph: It can be difficult, but research is showing that when it comes to sex crimes, youths are not just little adults. So why does the law tend to treat them that way?

headline.seo: Sex Offenders - Juvenilles - Sex Crimes - Rapes and Molestations - Children and Youth
headline.main: How Can You Distinguish a Budding Pedophile From a Kid With Real Boundary Problems?
headline.print_headline: How Can You Distinguish A Budding Pedophile From A Kid With Real Boundary Problems?
